GATE_ENCLOSE_PERCENTAGE.description: Approximate percentage of cells to be enclosed by the gate

SORT_COUNT.description: Number of cells to sort and collect. Sorting will end after meeting this condition

SORT_TIMEOUT.description: Maximum amount of time to spend on sorting in seconds

SAMPLE_PRESSURE.description: Sample pressure to use for samples. Range 4-6 recommended.

PRESSURE_LOOKUP_TABLE.description: Based on event counts, the adjustment to the pressure and sort timeout that is needed

GATE_CSV_DIR.name: check_directory.png
GATE_CSV_DIR.description: The local folder directory where exported gating data is stored.

BLUE_TUBE_ICON.name: blue_tube_icon.png
BLUE_TUBE_ICON.description: clicked to select the current sort

SCROLL_BAR.name: scroll_bar.png
SCROLL_BAR.description: arrow of a scroll bar to indicate its existence

SCROLL_BAR_BOTTOM.name: scroll_bar_bottom.png
SCROLL_BAR_BOTTOM.description: scroll bar at bottom to identify it is at the bottom

SAMPLE_PRESSURE_IMG.name: sample_pressure.png
SAMPLE_PRESSURE_IMG.description: Sample pressure image, offset is the regular spacing between values (px), 1_offset is the offset from the dropdown menu to 1

DUPLICATE_BTN.name: duplicate_btn.png
DUPLICATE_BTN.description: the duplicate button on the taskbar

STOP_VALUE.name: stop_value.png
STOP_VALUE.description: Amount of events to profile before stopping

NUM_GATES.name: num_gates.png
NUM_GATES.description: used to find the number of gates

SORT_METHOD.name: sort_method.png
SORT_METHOD.description: Set sort method from 2 way tube to 96 wp

96wp.name: 96wp.png
96wp.description: Select 96 well plate option for sort method

ASSIGN_BTN.name: assign_btn.png
ASSIGN_BTN.description: the assign button on the taskbar

NEXT_TUBE.name: next_tube.png
NEXT_TUBE.description: the next tube button on the taskbar (duplicates + assigns new tube)

PREV_SORT.name: prev_sort.png
PREV_SORT.description: clicked on to duplicate and create a new sort

NEW_PROFILE.name: new_profile.png
NEW_PROFILE.description: clicked on to rename the new profile that is just created

NEW_SORT.name: new_sort.png
NEW_SORT.description: clicked on to rename the new sort that is just created, after the profiling step

START_BTN.name: start_btn.png
START_BTN.description: clicked to start the program, the rgb value is used to check if the start button is available (enabled)

SORT_NAME.name: sort_name.png
SORT_NAME.description: Identifier for tubes that have been sorted

SORT_NAME_INACTIVE.name: sort_name_inactive.png
SORT_NAME_INACTIVE.description: Identifier for tubes that have been sorted from a previous experiment

STOP_BTN.name: stop_btn.png
STOP_BTN.description: clicked to stop recording the profiling (disabled)

OK_BTN.name: ok_btn.png
OK_BTN.description: clicked when the end condition is met (when there is a pop up) and when export is complete

ALL_EVENTS_UNSEL.name: all_events_unsel.png
ALL_EVENTS_UNSEL.description: All events img when it is not selected

ALL_EVENTS_SEL.name: all_events_sel.png
ALL_EVENTS_SEL.description: All events img when it is selected

FOURTH_GRAPH.description: How far away in x/y is the fourth gate from All Events

WORKSHEET_TOOLS.name: worksheet_tools.png
WORKSHEET_TOOLS.description: clicked to return to the worksheet tools tab

EXPORT_CSV_BTN.name: export_csv_btn.png
EXPORT_CSV_BTN.description: clicked to make the export window pop up

OUTPUT_PATH.name: output_path.png
OUTPUT_PATH.description: the 3 dots to pop up the save file window

STOP_CONDITION.name: stop_condition.png
STOP_CONDITION.description: finds the dropdown box to toggle the recording stop condition

SAVE_CSV.name: save_csv.png
SAVE_CSV.description: clicked to save the csv file

CLOSE_WORKSHEET.name: close_worksheet.png
CLOSE_WORKSHEET.description: close the working worksheet to allow gatevertextool to run

YES_BTN.name: yes_btn.png
YES_BTN.description: close the working worksheet to allow gatevertextool to run

SORT_SETTINGS_BTN.name: sortsettings_btn.png
SORT_SETTINGS_BTN.description: clicked when to initialize sorting settings

TOP_CORNER_WELL.name: top_corner_well.png
TOP_CORNER_WELL.description: The screen grab of the top corner of the well used to calibrate for all locations

Sort_Gate.name: sort_gate.png
Sort_Gate.description: used to find the sort_gate dropdown menu and click on the 4th gate using y_offset

Sort_Mode.name: sort_mode.png
Sort_Mode.description: used to find the Sort Mode dropdown menu (can be updated as an offset from sort gate

Ultra_Purity.description: the offset is how far the option is in the dropdown list

Stop_Count.name: stop_count.png
Stop_Count.description: used to find the stop_count text box

ADD_BTN.name: add_btn.png
ADD_BTN.description: clicked to create the new profile

SortID_Header.name: sortID_header.png
SortID_Header.description: used to locate the previous sort, which should be removed

REMOVE_BTN.name: remove_btn.png
REMOVE_BTN.description: cliccloked to remove the previous sort

Desired_Sorting_Param.name: setup_status.png
Desired_Sorting_Param.description: triple check all the parameters are input correctly

SORT_AND_RECORD_BTN.name: sort_and_record_btn.png
SORT_AND_RECORD_BTN.description: clicked to start sort and record the progress

WAIT_TIMES.description: The different wait times in s
